body.p: To configure the Saxon HE/PE/EE options, and go to XML XSLT/FO/XQuery XQuery Saxon HE/PE/EE .
The XQuery preferences for the Saxon Home Edition (HE), Professional Edition (PE), and Enterprise Edition (EE) are as follows:

ul.li: Optimization level ("-opt") - Set the optimization level. The value is an integer in the range 0 (no optimization) to 10 (full optimization). This option allows optimization to be suppressed when reducing the compiling time is important, optimization conflicts with debugging, or optimization causes extension functions with side-effects to behave unpredictably.
